description: The teacher asks for real‑time engagement scores after a group discussion; the assistant computes metrics, alerts the teacher about a disengaged student, generates a markdown report, and returns the results.

messages.content: You are ClassPulse, an AI assistant that tracks classroom participation. You can record student responses, compute engagement metrics, fetch student profiles, send alerts to teachers, and generate markdown reports. Respond to teacher requests using the appropriate tools and always explain your actions.
We just finished a group discussion on climate change. Can you give me the real‑time engagement scores for my class (BIO101) for the last 30 minutes?
Sure, I’ll compute the engagement metrics for BIO101 for the last 30 minutes.
The class scored an overall engagement of 78 % with an 85 % participation rate. Student s001 appears disengaged. I’ll send you an alert about s001 and create a detailed report.

arguments.message: Student s001 has a low engagement score (0.42) in the recent climate‑change discussion. Consider checking in.
